title: Dio in the Dark
description: "Be young tonight, if you must. For tomorrow and tomorrow and tomorrow you will grow old, and the night will no longer be your lover."The powers of the pantheon have faded. The gods live amongst the mortals, grasping for what little of their divinity remains.When Zeus - King of the Gods - goes missing in modern-day Toronto, it is up to his estranged son, Dio, to find him.And with rumors of The Darkness coming, Dio will have to race to find his father, and uncover the truth before it's too late!
author: Rizwan Asad
